unnormalised: Organic farming offers promising avenues for sustainable agriculture in India. Practices like using desi cow manure and vermicompost can enrich soil health, reducing reliance on chemical fertilizers. Implementing crop rotation strategies, as seen in Punjab's fields, can naturally control pests. Embracing organic methods could enhance the quality of produce, especially during festive seasons like Onam, ensuring better biryani ingredients. Institutions like IARI are playing a crucial role in researching and promoting these techniques nationwide.
